data.chText: 打算；计划；意图；目的
data.enText: what you intend or plan to do; your aim

data.chText: 我无意去参加婚礼。
data.enText: I have no intention of going to the wedding.

data.chText: 他已经宣布他打算退休。
data.enText: He has announced his intention to retire.

data.chText: 我没有要她吃苦头的意思。
data.enText: It was not my intention that she should suffer.

data.chText: 他离开英格兰，打算去非洲旅行。
data.enText: He left England with the intention of travelling in Africa.

data.chText: 我一心想把我欠她的还给她。
data.enText: I have every intention of paying her back what I owe her.

data.chText: 最初的计划是在这个项目上投入三个月的时间。
data.enText: The original intention was to devote three months to the project.

data.chText: 她虽然处处出于善意，却往往事与愿违。
data.enText: She's full of good intentions but they rarely work out.

data.chText: 我的原意是要帮忙，却惹得他们生气了。
data.enText: I did it with the best (of) intentions (= meaning to help) , but I only succeeded in annoying them.
the road to hell is paved with good intentions

data.chText: 黄泉路上徒有好意多；光说不练是不够的
data.enText: it is not enough to intend to do good things; you must actually do them

data.text: purpose ♦ aim ♦ intention ♦ plan ♦ point ♦ idea

data.chText: 以上各词均指意图、目的、目标。
data.enText: These are all words for talking about what sb/sth intends to do or achieve.
purpose

data.chText: 指目的、目标：
data.enText: what sth is supposed to achieve; what sb is trying to achieve

data.chText: 我们这次活动的主要目的是募款。
data.enText: Our campaign's main purpose is to raise money.
aim

data.chText: 指目标、目的：
data.enText: what sb is trying to achieve; what sth is supposed to achieve

data.chText: 她去伦敦是为了找工作。
data.enText: She went to London with the aim of finding a job.

data.chText: 我们的主要目标是增加在欧洲的销售量。
data.enText: Our main aim is to increase sales in Europe.

data.chText: 用purpose还是aim？
purpose指做某事的原因，aim指要达到的目的。aim可以指尝试达到目的，purpose含有要成就某事的强烈感觉。aim可指某人的目的（sb's aim），也可指某事的目的（the aim of sth），purpose更常指做某事的原因（the purpose of sth），也可指某人的目的（sb's purpose），但这样用较正式。
data.enText: Your purpose for doing something is your reason for doing it; your aim is what you want to achieve. Aim can suggest that you are only trying to achieve sth; purpose gives a stronger sense of achievement being certain. Aim can be sb's aim or the aim of sth . Purpose is more usually the purpose of sth : you can talk about sb's purpose but that is more formal.
purpose or aim?
intention

data.chText: 指打算、计划、意图：
data.enText: what you intend to do

data.chText: 我无意去参加婚礼。
data.enText: I have no intention of going to the wedding.

data.chText: 她虽然处处出于善意，却很少产生效果。
data.enText: She's full of good intentions but they rarely work out.
plan

data.chText: 指计划、打算：
data.enText: what you intend to do or achieve

data.chText: 现在没有建新办公楼的计划。
data.enText: There are no plans to build new offices.

data.chText: 用intention还是plan？
intention尤指近期的打算、意图；plan通常但不总是指较长远的计划、安排。
data.enText: Your intentions are what you want to do, especially in the near future; your plans are what you have decided or arranged to do, often, but not always, in the longer term.
intention or plan?
point

data.chText: 指意图、目的、理由：
data.enText: ( rather informal ) the purpose or aim of sth

data.chText: 这些暴行的意图何在？
data.enText: What's the point of all this violence?

data.chText: 本课的目的是比较这两个国家。
data.enText: The point of the lesson is to compare the two countries.
idea

data.chText: 指目的、意图：
data.enText: ( rather informal ) the purpose of sth; sb's aim

data.chText: 我们去的唯一目的就是要见她的新男朋友。
data.enText: The whole idea of going was so that we could meet her new boyfriend.

data.chText: 这背后的意图是什么？
data.enText: What's the idea behind this?

data.chText: 用point还是idea？
point比idea有更多的否定含义：what's the point ...?暗指毫无意义；what's the idea ...?用于真正询问目的。用point而非idea表示对所谈论的事情感到不快：
data.enText: Point is a more negative word than idea. If you say What's the point…? you are suggesting that there is no point; if you say What's the idea…? you are genuinely asking a question. Point , but not idea , is used to talk about things you feel annoyed or unhappy about.
There's no idea in…
I don't see the idea of…
point or idea?
with the purpose/aim/intention/idea of doing sth
sb's intention/plan to do sth
a(n) ambitious/realistic aim/plan
to have a(n) purpose/aim/intention/plan/point
to achieve/fulfil a(n) purpose/aim

simple_means.memory_skill: in 不 + tent 伸展 + ion 动作或状态 → 意图

ex.chText: 该公司已宣布打算向银行贷款。
ex.enText: The company has declared its intent to get a bank loan.

ex.chText: 他打破窗户意图入室行窃。
ex.enText: He broke the window with the intent to enter and steal.

ex.chText: 他否认持有枪械是为了抢劫。
ex.enText: He denies possessing the gun with the intent to commit robbery.

synonyms.bx: 指某人做某事的目的；也可作法律术语，指犯罪意图。

ex.chText: 他认为这件事是事先安排的。
ex.enText: He believed that this had happened by design.

ex.chText: 关于他对公司的这些宏图大计，你有什么想法？
ex.enText: What is your opinion on his grand designs for the company?

synonyms.bx: 指在头脑中形成的计划，有时含贬义。

ex.chText: 我来伦敦是为了学习英国文学。
ex.enText: I came to London with the intention of studying English literature.
She has no intention of making an apology to John.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指做某事的打算或计划。

data.enText: the road to hell is paved with good intentions

data.chText: 黄泉路上徒有好意多；光说不练是不够的
data.enText: it is not enough to intend to do good things; you must actually do them

tr: a volition that you intend to carry out
example: my intention changed once I saw her

tr: an anticipated outcome that is intended or that guides your planned actions
example: his intent was to provide a new translation
it was created with the conscious aim of answering immediate needs
he made no secret of his designs

tr: (usually plural) the goal with respect to a marriage proposal

value.def: An intention is an idea or plan of what you are going to do.

example.ex: Beveridge announced his intention of standing for parliament...
example.tran: 贝弗里奇宣布他打算竞选议员。

example.ex: It is my intention to remain in my position until a successor is elected...
example.tran: 我的打算是继续呆在岗位上,直到选出继任者。

example.ex: Unfortunately, his good intentions never seemed to last long.
example.tran: 不幸的是,他的善意似乎从来就没有持久过。

value.def: If you say that you have no intention of doing something, you are emphasizing that you are not going to do it. If you say that you have every intention of doing something, you are emphasizing that you intend to do it.

example.ex: We have no intention of buying American jets...
example.tran: 我们无意购买美国喷气式飞机。

example.ex: Those close to him are convinced that he has every intention of staying on until the end of his seven-year term.
example.tran: 他身边的人都确信他打算继续留任，直到 7 年任期期满。

value.tran: 不想/很想;不打算/一心打算

trans: 矛盾意向法；矛盾意向；欲擒故纵法；相反意图法
本意；真意；真实意图；真正目的
恶意；歹意；邪念；罪恶的动机
行为意图；行为意向；行为意愿；行为倾向
不是故意地；无意地；无意的

partsOfSpeech.dec: at 加强 + tend 伸展 → 延伸〔服务〕→ 看护
attend 出席；看护 + ant …的，具有…性质的 → 出席的
at 加强 + tent 伸展 + ion 表状态 → 伸展出去〔听别人讲〕→ 注意力
at 表加强 + tent 伸展 + ive …的 → 注意的；关心的
con 共同 + tend 伸展 → 一起伸展〔个人观点〕→ 争论
dis 分散 + tend 伸展 →〔向各个方向〕分散伸展 → 扩张
ex 出 + tend 伸展 → 伸出去 → 扩张
ex 出 + tens 伸展 + ion 动作或状态 → 伸展；延期
ex 出 + tens 伸展 + ive 有…性质的 → 可四处伸展的 → 广泛的
ex 出 + tent 伸展 →〔身体〕伸展开 → 程度
in 使… + tend 伸展 → 使〔想法〕伸展 → 打算
in 不 + tens 伸展 + e → 拉到了不能再拉的地步 → 强烈的
intens〔e〕强烈的 + ify 使 → 加强
in 不 + tent 伸展 → 意图
in 不 + tent 伸展 + ion 动作或状态 → 意图
pre 前 + tend 伸展 → 向前伸手 → 假装〔乞讨〕
pre 预先 + tent 伸展 + ious …的 → 将优势伸展 → 自负的
tend 伸展 + ence 表状态 → 伸展的状态 → 趋向
tend 伸展 + ency 表状态 → 倾向
tens 伸展 + ible 可…的 → 可伸展的
tens 伸展 + ion 表名词 → 伸展到极点 → 张力
